page.saving:
Đang lưu.

Việc này có thể mất vài giây.
die.sorry: Xin lỗi, Numbas đã gặp phải một lỗi có nghĩa là nó không thể tiếp tục. Lỗi này được mô tả dưới đây.
suspend.exam suspended: Bài thi bị tạm ngưng. Nhấn Tiếp tục để tiếp tục.
suspend.you can resume: Bạn sẽ có thể tiếp tục lần thử này khi bạn tiếp tục hoạt động này vào lần tới.
result.print: In bản tóm tắt kết quả này
result.questions attempted: Câu hỏi đã cố gắng làm
result.click a question to review: Bấm vào câu hỏi để xem câu trả lời của bạn được chấm như thế nào và lời giải đầy đủ (nếu có).
end.exam has finished: Bài kiểm tra đã kết thúc. Bây giờ bạn có thể đóng cửa sổ này.
control.confirm leave: Bạn chưa hoàn thành bài kiểm tra.
control.not all questions answered: Bạn chưa hoàn thành mọi câu hỏi trong bài kiểm tra này.
control.not all questions submitted: Bạn đã thay đổi một hoặc nhiều câu trả lời nhưng không gửi chúng. Vui lòng kiểm tra từng câu hỏi đã được gửi.
control.confirm end: Bạn có chắc chắn muốn kết thúc bài kiểm tra? Sau khi bạn kết thúc bài kiểm tra, bạn sẽ không thể thay đổi bất kỳ câu trả lời nào của mình.
control.confirm regen: Bạn có muốn thử một phiên bản mới (ngẫu nhiên) của câu hỏi này? Nếu bạn bấm vào OK, tất cả các câu trả lời và điểm cho câu hỏi hiện tại của bạn sẽ bị mất.
control.confirm reveal: Bạn có muốn xem câu trả lời cho câu hỏi này? Tất cả số điểm bạn nhận được cho đến nay sẽ bị khóa và bạn sẽ không thể trả lời câu hỏi này về sau.
control.regen: Hãy thử một câu hỏi khác như câu này
exam.xml.bad root: Root element of exam XML should be 'exam'
exam.changeQuestion.no questions: Bài kiểm tra này không có câu hỏi! Kiểm tra tệp .exam để xem lỗi.
jme.shunt.not enough arguments: Không đủ đối số cho phép toán {{op}}
jme.shunt.no left bracket in function: Không có dấu ngoặc trái trong hàm ứng dụng hoặc bộ dữ liệu
jme.shunt.no left square bracket: Không có dấu ngoặc vuông trái
jme.shunt.no right square bracket: Không có dấu ngoặc vuông phải ở cuối danh sách
jme.shunt.missing operator: Biểu thức không thể được đánh giá - thiếu một phép toán.
jme.typecheck.function maybe implicit mu: Hàm {{name}} không được định nghĩa. Ý bạn là {{first}}*{{possibleOp}}(...)?
jme.typecheck.function not defined: Hàm {{op}} không được định nghĩa. Có phải {{op}} là biến không, và ý bạn là {{suggestion}}*(...)?
jme.typecheck.op not defined: Phép toán  '{{op}}' không được định nghĩa
jme.typecheck.no right type definition: Không tìm thấy định nghĩa '{{op}}' đúng loại.
jme.typecheck.map not on enumerable: map phép toán phải được hoạt động trên một danh sách hoặc một miền, không trên {{type}}
jme.thtml.not html: Đã chuyển một giá trị không phải HTML vào hàm tạo THTML.
jme.func.switch.no default case: Không có trường hợp mặc định cho câu lệnh Switch
jme.func.listval.invalid index: Invalid list index {{index}} on list of size {{size}}
jme.func.matrix.invalid row type: Can't construct a matrix from rows of type {{type}}
jme.func.except.continuous range: Can't use the 'except' operator on continuous ranges.
jme.matrix.reports bad size: Matrix reports its size incorrectly - must be an error in constructor function
jme.variables.circular reference: Circular variable reference in definition of {{name}}
jme.variables.question took too many run: A valid set of question variables was not generated in time.
jme.display.simplifyTree.no scope given: Numbas.jme.display.simplifyTree must be given a Scope
math.precround.complex: Can't round to a complex number of decimal places
math.siground.complex: Can't round to a complex number of sig figs
math.combinations.complex: Can't compute combinations of complex numbers
math.permutations.complex: Can't compute permutations of complex numbers
math.gcf.complex: Can't compute GCF of complex numbers
math.lcm.complex: Can't compute LCM of complex numbers
math.choose.empty selection: Empty selection given to random function
matrixmath.abs.non-square: Can't compute the determinant of a matrix which isn't square.
matrixmath.abs.too big: Sorry, can't compute the determinant of a matrix bigger than 3x3 yet.
matrixmath.mul.different sizes: Can't multiply matrices of different sizes.
vectormath.cross.not 3d: Can only take the cross product of 3-dimensional vectors.
vectormath.dot.matrix too big: Can't calculate dot product of a matrix which isn't $1 \times N$ or $N \times 1$.
vectormath.cross.matrix too big: Can't calculate cross product of a matrix which isn't $1 \times N$ or $N \times 1$.
part.marking.steps no matter: Because you received full marks for the part, your answers to the steps aren't counted.
part.marking.used variable replacements: This part was marked using your answers to previous parts.
part.marking.resubmit because of variabl: This part's marking depends on your answers to other parts, which you have changed. Submit this part again to update your score.
part.marking.did not answer: You did not answer this question.
part.marking.nothing entered: You did not enter an answer.
part.marking.no result: This part could not be marked.
part.jme.answer invalid:
Your answer is not a valid mathematical expression.
{{-message}}.
part.jme.must-have several: Your answer must contain all of: {{strings}}
part.jme.not-allowed several: Your answer must not contain any of: {{strings}}
part.jme.unexpected variable name: Your answer was interpreted to use the unexpected variable name {{name}}.
part.jme.unexpected variable name sugges: Your answer was interpreted to use the unexpected variable name {{name}}. Did you mean {{suggestion}}?
part.patternmatch.correct except case: Your answer is correct, except for the case.
part.numberentry.correct except decimal: Your answer is within the allowed range, but decimal numbers are not allowed.
part.numberentry.correct except fraction: Your answer is within the allowed range, but fractions are not allowed.
part.numberentry.answer invalid: You did not enter a valid number.
part.numberentry.answer not integer: Your answer is invalid. You must enter a whole number, not a decimal.
part.numberentry.answer not integer or d: Your answer is invalid. You must enter an integer or a decimal.
part.numberentry.zero sig fig: This part is set up to round the student's answer to zero significant figures, which has no meaning.
part.mcq.options def not a list: The expression defining the {{properties}} is not a list.
part.mcq.marking matrix string empty: The custom marking matrix expression is empty.
part.mcq.matrix not a number: Part {{part}} marking matrix cell ({{row}},{{column}}) does not evaluate to a number
part.mcq.wrong number of choices: You selected the wrong number of choices.
part.mcq.matrix not a list: Marking matrix, defined by JME expression, is not a list but it should be.
part.mcq.matrix wrong type: Element of invalid type '{{type}}' used in marking matrix.
part.mcq.matrix mix of numbers and lists: Mix of numbers and lists used in marking matrix.
part.mcq.matrix wrong size: Marking matrix is the wrong size.
part.matrix.invalid cell: One or more of the cells in your answer is empty or invalid.
part.matrix.some incorrect: One or more of the cells in your answer is incorrect, but you have been awarded marks for the rest.
part.matrix.empty: You have not entered an answer.
part.matrix.empty cell: One or more of the cells in your answer is empty.
part.matrix.size mismatch: The question author hasn't allowed the student to decide the dimensions of their answer, but the correct answer is {{correct_dimensions}} while the answer input is {{input_dimensions}}
question.loaded name mismatch: Can't resume this attempt - the package has changed since the last session.
question.show steps no penalty: Your score will not be affected.
question.show steps already penalised: You have already shown steps. You can show them again with no further penalty.
question.hide steps no penalty: Your score will not be affected.
question.can not submit: Can not submit answer - check for errors.
xml.property not number: Property {{name}} should be a number, but isn't ({{value}}), in node {{element}}
xml.property not boolean: Property {{name}} should be a boolean, but isn't ({{value}}), in node {{element}}
scorm.failed save:
The request to save data to the server failed. Press OK to try again.

If you get this message repeatedly, check your internet connection or use a different computer. Your previously submitted answers have been successfully saved and will be restored if you resume this session on a different computer.

If this message appears persistently and you can't save any answers, please contact your lecturer or teacher.
scorm.no exam suspend data: Failed to resume: no exam suspend data.
part.marking.steps change: You were awarded {{count,niceNumber}} $t(mark) for your answers to the steps.
part.marking.revealed steps with penalty: You revealed the steps. The maximum you can score for this part is {{count,niceNumber}} $t(mark). Your scores will be scaled down accordingly.
question.unsubmitted changes: You have made a change to your answer but not submitted it. Please check your answer and then press the Submit answer button.
question.unsubmitted changes_plural: You have made changes to your answers but not submitted them. Please check your answers to each part and then press the Submit all parts button.
die.script not loaded: Numbas couldn't start because the file {{file}} was not loaded. Check that it's included in scripts.js.
math.combinations.n less than zero: Can't compute combinations: n is less than zero
math.combinations.k less than zero: Can't compute combinations: k is less than zero
math.combinations.n less than k: Can't compute combinations: n is less than k
math.permutations.n less than zero: Can't compute permutations: n is less than zero
math.permutations.k less than zero: Can't compute permutations: k is less than zero
math.permutations.n less than k: Can't compute permutations: n is less than k
part.numberentry.give your answer to pre: Round your answer to the nearest integer.
jme.tokenise.keypair key not a string: Dictionary key should be a string, not {{type}}.
jme.shunt.list mixed argument types: Can't parse {{mode}}: mix of dictionary and list elements
jme.func.listval.key not in dict: Dictionary does not contain the key {{key}}
part.numberentry.answer not reduced: Your answer is not reduced to lowest terms.
part.numberentry.give your answer as a r: Reduce your answer to lowest terms.
part.numberentry.negative decimal places: This part is set up to round the student's answer to a negative number of decimal places, which has no meaning.
part.mcq.matrix cell empty: Part {{part}} marking matrix cell ({{row}},{{column}}) is empty
part.mcq.matrix jme error: Part {{part}} marking matrix cell ({{row}},{{column}}) gives a JME error: {{-error}}
ruleset.circular reference: Circular reference in definition of ruleset {{name}}
jme.evaluate.no scope given: Numbas.jme.evaluate must be given a Scope
answer.number.not a number: Your answer is not a valid number.
answer.number.fractions not allowed: You may not enter a fraction.
answer.matrix.some cell not a number: One or more of the cells in your answer is not a valid number.
exam.password.correct: This password is correct. You can start the exam.
frontpage.scorm.lms not connected: This exam is running in standalone mode. Your answers and marks will not be saved!
control.confirm regen no marks: Would you like to re-randomise this question?
control.confirm reveal no marks: Would you like to reveal the answer to this question?
jme.tokenise.number.object not complex: Invalid object passed into number constructor.
jme.type.type already registered: The data type {{type}} has already been registered so can't be registered again.
jme.display.simplifyTree.stuck in a loop: Simplifier is stuck in a loop: {{expr}}
math.niceNumber.undefined: Was expecting a number, but got undefined
math.rangeToList.zero step size: Can't convert a range with step size zero to a list.
part.marking.maximum scaled down: The maximum you can score for this part is {{count,niceNumber}} $t(mark). Your scores will be scaled down accordingly.
part.marking.minimum score applied: The minimum score for this part is {{score,niceNumber}}.
part.marking.maximum score applied: The maximum score for this part is {{score,niceNumber}}.
part.marking.error in marking script: There was an error in this part's marking algorithm. Please report this. {{-message}}
part.marking.no result after replacement: This part could not be marked using your answers to previous parts.
part.marking.missing required note: The marking algorithm does not define the note {{note}}
marking.apply.not a list: The first argument to apply must be a list, and isn't
marking.note.invalid definition.missing: You might be missing a colon after the name and description
marking.note.invalid definition.descript: You might be missing a closing bracket
part.feedback out of date: This feedback is based on your last submitted answer. Submit your changed answer to get updated feedback.
part.jme.invalid value generator express: Invalid value generator expression for variable {{name}}: {{-message}}
part.matrix.not all cells same precision: You have not given every cell in your answer to the same precision.
part.custom.input option missing: Definition of input option {{option}} is missing.
part.jme.must-match.failed: Your answer is not in the right form.
